name: places/ChIJdTDgH1xYwokRKWoLbT9GOjQ
formattedAddress: 229 W 60th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 229 W 60th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
I took my dog in a few weeks ago and have this to say:

Pros: The people there are great. They seem to enjoy their job and really enjoy their work.

Cons: The place is an absolute rip off financially and I do not believe they keep the dogs in a good place.

When I first walked in, the playrooms genuinely look like prison cells from Rikers Island. Dogs can pee/poo anywhere and anytime in this small room with no sunlight. Although someone does clean it up, as an owner I have no idea who cleans it and when it gets cleaned. I am sure they will respond and say that they clean it up immediately but I highly doubt that.

In terms of the finances - it's an absolute ripoff if you want your dog to have a normal daycare day.
Want them to be fed a midday snack that WE provide to the staff? - $8 extra
Want them to go outside for a pee break? - $15 extra
Want them to go for a proper 30 minute walk during the day? - $30 extra

It's so sad that just the base price of $68 of daycare does not include any of that and that the dogs don't get a breath of fresh air or food at all during the day without an additional cost.

There are a variety of other daycare places nearby that give just as much care and do not cost as much... The pricing model is very scammy and they will try to squeeze every penny from you.

Verdict: Do not take your dog here

originalText.text: My dog loves it here, and the staff is excellent. They really take pride in what they do, and it shows. I’ve used several dog day cares in NYC, and none compare. Highly recommend.

text.text: My dog loves it here, and the staff is excellent. They really take pride in what they do, and it shows. I’ve used several dog day cares in NYC, and none compare. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Awesome and friendly staff! All the pups there look happy, which made me feel comfortable the first time I dropped off my pup. Dulce (my pup) looks forward to visiting Esther and the team. In addition, the team is helpful breaking down costs and confirming the online requests. After the visit we like to hang out near the water front and take in the breeze.

text.text: Awesome and friendly staff! All the pups there look happy, which made me feel comfortable the first time I dropped off my pup. Dulce (my pup) looks forward to visiting Esther and the team. In addition, the team is helpful breaking down costs and confirming the online requests. After the visit we like to hang out near the water front and take in the breeze.

originalText.text: Our pup has such a wonderful and loving extended family at B&B. We simply would not know what to do without their care, convenience and incredible service. For our furry child, the time with his friends and the B&B staff is the best part of his day.

text.text: Our pup has such a wonderful and loving extended family at B&B. We simply would not know what to do without their care, convenience and incredible service. For our furry child, the time with his friends and the B&B staff is the best part of his day.

originalText.text: The staff is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING. Super friendly, professional, and it's clear they all genuinely love dogs. Facilities are incredibly clean. As a self-proclaimed helicopter dog mom, I feel so lucky to have such a great doggy daycare close to my apartment. Whenever I pass by the location on potty walks, my 75lb dogter will punch the door and try to get inside so she can go play with her favorite people and puppers. This location comes highly recommended.
